mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_ID , STUDENT_NAME , STUDENT_REGIDATE , STUDENT_TERM , STUDENT_YEAR , STUDENT_TOTAL_CREDIT, STUDENT_TERM_GRADE , STUDENT_TOTAL_GRADE , STUDENT_MAJOR , STUDENT_FIRST_MAJOR FROM STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{student_id}

SELECT SB.SUB_SEQ , SB.SUB_CATEGORY , SB.MAJOR_NUMBER , SB.SUB_SEMESTER , SB.SUB_NAME , SB.PROFESSOR_ID , SB.PROFESSOR_NAME, SB.SUB_INFO , A.STUDENT_ID , ST.STUDENT_NAME , ST.STUDENT_YEAR , A.PROFESSOR_GRADE FROM SUBJECT SB, STUDENT ST, ASSESSMENT A WHERE SB.SUB_SEQ = A.SUB_SEQ_NUM AND A.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND A.STUDENT_ID = ST.STUDENT_ID AND ST.STUDENT_YEAR = #{student_year} AND ST.STUDENT_TERM = #{sub_semester} AND A.PROFESSOR_GRADE = 0

SELECT ST.STUDENT_ID , ST.STUDENT_NAME , ST.STUDENT_REGIDATE , U.USER_PW , U.USER_EMAIL , U.USER_PHONE , U.USER_ADDRESS , U.USER_STATUS , U.USER_PHOTO FROM STUDENT ST, USERS U WHERE ST.STUDENT_ID = U.USER_ID AND ST.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id}

SELECT ST.STUDENT_ID , SB.SUB_SEMESTER , SB.SUB_INFO , SB.SUB_CATEGORY , AT.STUDENT_SCORE, SB.SUB_POINT , ST.STUDENT_TERM FROM STUDENT ST, SUBJECT SB, ASSESSMENT AT WHERE SB.SUB_SEQ = AT.SUB_SEQ_NUM AND ST.STUDENT_ID = AT.STUDENT_ID AND ST.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND AT.PROFESSOR_GRADE > 0

SELECT ST.STUDENT_ID , SB.SUB_SEMESTER , SB.SUB_INFO , SB.SUB_CATEGORY , AT.STUDENT_SCORE, SB.SUB_POINT , ST.STUDENT_TERM , AT.SEMESTER FROM STUDENT ST, SUBJECT SB, ASSESSMENT AT WHERE SB.SUB_SEQ = AT.SUB_SEQ_NUM AND ST.STUDENT_ID = AT.STUDENT_ID AND ST.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND AT.SEMESTER = #{semester}

SELECT AT.STUDENT_NAME , SB.SUB_SEQ , SB.SUB_SEMESTER , SUB_CATEGORY , SB.PROFESSOR_NAME , SB.SUB_INFO , SB.SUB_POINT , AT.STUDENT_SCORE , AT.PROFESSOR_GRADE, AT.GRADE_CONFIRM FROM ASSESSMENT AT, SUBJECT SB WHERE AT.SUB_SEQ_NUM = SB.SUB_SEQ AND AT.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND AT.PROFESSOR_GRADE > 0 AND AT.GRADE_CONFIRM = 0
